entry.title: SWEET VALENTINE $BLUR AIRDROP CONFIRMED 🪂🌹 February 14th. You can continue to earn $BLUR care packages by posting bids on collections until then...
entry.summary:
SWEET VALENTINE $BLUR AIRDROP CONFIRMED 🪂🌹 February 14th. You can continue to earn $BLUR care packages by posting bids on collections until then.
Blur: $BLUR is launching February 14 We know this is past our initial estimate of January and we’re sorry for the delay. We’re trying new things and the extra two weeks will allow us to deliver a launch that hasn’t been done before. Airdrop 3 will continue until then.

entry.summary: Free “Friendship bracelet” mint worth 1.2 ETH for anyone who has held min. 1 @artblocks_io piece before October 26 📸 To claim go to If you qualify you will see an option to mint 2 friendship bracelets. 24hrs left! http://artblocks.io
